name: Rift Eternal
text: Fusion Summon 1 "Etherym" Fusion monster from your Extra Deck by using monsters from your hand, banishing the Fusion Materials listed on it from your GY, or by shuffling the Fusion Material from your face-up banished cards into the Deck. If this card is in the GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can shuffle 1 of your banished "Etherym" cards into the Deck, and if you do, add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Rift Eternal" once per turn.
